entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
